job.title: Marketing Analyst
job.description: This role will support the execution and growth of Vroom’s product-feed based acquisition channels, orchestrating a mix of proprietary and third party tools.  This role is integral to the team and the company, as many of Vroom’s largest partnerships depend on product-feeds and third-party site merchandising. This position will work across a spectrum of external partners and internal stakeholders, including product, data, brand marketing, digital marketing, and supply. Responsibilities Ensure high visibility for Vroom’s inventory across a broad spectrum of acquisition channels, via management over a suite of data-feed oriented tools Create, deploy, and measure feed-based optimization tests Monitor dashboards, tracking product feed health Project manage copy and creative implementation through the spectrum of external partners Support partnership development, onboarding, and ad-hoc marketing analysis through research, data collection, and data validation Create, manage, and deploy website UTM tracking codes and phone numbers across the marketing organization Requirements Demonstrated strength in deductive reasoning, logic, numbers, and problem-solving skills Highly sophisticated communication skills (oral and written) Positive attitude and presentable demeanor with an ability to work collaboratively in a rapidly changing environment Strong team player High attention to detail Strong work ethic, drive and stamina Ability to work independently with intense and consistent focus Strong organization and time management skills
